Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
public class Player
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Models a player, composed by a nickname, faith points indicating the current position in the faith track, the amount of pope favours activated, a board and a map containing the possessed leaders and a boolean true if the leader is active.

  • Constructor Summary

      public boolean isLeaderActive​(LeaderCard card)
      Checks if the given LeaderCard is active.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to check
      Returns:
      true if the card is active, false if it is not active or if it is not present

    • setLeaderActive

      public void setLeaderActive​(LeaderCard leaderCard) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Activates a leader card possessed by the player by putting the true value in the card map.
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - a leader card to be activated
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given leader card is not present in this player board or if it is already active

    • notifyInitialTurn

      public void notifyInitialTurn​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards, int resourcesToPick, int faithPointsGiven)
      Notifies this Player of the start of the game, sending him all necessary information.
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - the initial leader cards to give to the player
      resourcesToPick - the number of resources that the player can pick
      faithPointsGiven - the amount of faith points initially given to the player

    • setLeaderCards

      Setter for the leader cards of the player.

      cards - a new list of leader cards of the player.

      Returns:
      the number of discounts on the given resource

      public boolean hasLeaderWhiteConversion​(Resource resource)
      Checks if the Player has an active leader card with the given white conversion.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to convert to
      Returns:
      true if the player has this special ability, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(LeaderCard card) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Discards the given LeaderCard from this player hand.
      Parameters:
      card - the leader card that will be discarded
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the player does not have this leader card in his hand or if this card is already active

    • isLeaderSelectionValid

      public boolean isLeaderSelectionValid​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> selected)
      Checks if the given leader cards are a valid selection. Used during first turn of the Player to avoid cheating and state inconsistency.
      Parameters:
      selected - the leader cards that the player wants to keep
      Returns:
      true if the selected leader cards are valid, false otherwise

    • keepLeaders

      public void keepLeaders​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> selected) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Keeps the given leader cards and removes the others from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      selected - the leader cards that the player wants to keep
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Returns:
      the leader card with the given UUID or null if not found

      Checks if this Player has the given resources.
      Parameters:
      resources - a map associating resource type to quantity
      Returns:
      true if this player has at least the given types and amounts of resources, false otherwise
